verses.verse: Ταῦτα <WG3778> Tauta these things ( Persecution Foretold) λελάληκα <WG2980> lelalēka [“] I have told ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv σκανδαλισθῆτε <WG4624> skandalisthēte you will not fall away .

ἀποσυναγώγους <WG656> aposynagōgous out of the synagogues . ποιήσουσιν <WG4160> poiēsousin They will put ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ In fact , ἔρχεται <WG2064> erchetai is coming ὥρα <WG5610> hōra a time ἵνα <WG2443> hina when πᾶς <WG3956> pas anyone ὁ <WG3588> ho who ἀποκτείνας <WG615> apokteinas kills ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you δόξῃ <WG1380> doxē will think λατρείαν <WG2999> latreian a service προσφέρειν <WG4374> prospherein he is offering τῷ <WG3588> tō - Θεῷ <WG2316> Theō to God .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta these things ποιήσουσιν <WG4160> poiēsousin They will do ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because οὐκ <WG3756> ouk - ἔγνωσαν <WG1097> egnōsan they have not known τὸν <WG3588> ton the Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father οὐδὲ <WG3761> oude [or] ἐμέ <WG1473> eme Me .

ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla But ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta these things λελάληκα <WG2980> lelalēka I have told ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that ὅταν <WG3752> hotan when ἔλθῃ <WG2064> elthē comes , ἡ <WG3588> hē - ὥρα <WG5610> hōra hour αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn their μνημονεύητε <WG3421> mnēmoneuēte you will remember αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn [about] them . ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I εἶπον <WG2036> eipon told ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta these things δὲ <WG1161> de - ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you ἐξ <WG1537> ex from ἀρχῆς <WG746> archēs [the] beginning , οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv εἶπον <WG2036> eipon I did not tell ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because μεθ’ <WG3326> meth’ with ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn you . ἤμην <WG1510> ēmēn I was

( The Promise of the Holy Spirit) ( ( 500 14:15-26 )) Νῦν <WG3568> Nyn Now , δὲ <WG1161> de however , ὑπάγω <WG5217> hypagō I am going πρὸς <WG4314> pros to τὸν <WG3588> ton Him who πέμψαντά <WG3992> pempsanta sent με <WG1473> me Me ; καὶ <WG2532> kai yet οὐδεὶς <WG3762> oudeis none ἐξ <WG1537> ex of ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn you ἐρωτᾷ <WG2065> erōta asks με <WG1473> me Me , Ποῦ <WG4226> Pou ‘ Where ὑπάγεις <WG5217> hypageis are You going ? ’

ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ Instead , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta these things . λελάληκα <WG2980> lelalēka I have told ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you ἡ <WG3588> hē - λύπη <WG3077> lypē with sorrow πεπλήρωκεν <WG4137> peplērōken are filled ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your τὴν <WG3588> tēn - καρδίαν <WG2588> kardian hearts

ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ But ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I τὴν <WG3588> tēn the ἀλήθειαν <WG225> alētheian truth , λέγω <WG3004> legō tell ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you συμφέρει <WG4851> sympherei it is for your benefit ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin . . . ἵνα <WG2443> hina that ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I ἀπέλθω <WG565> apelthō am going away . ἐὰν <WG1437> ean Unless γὰρ <WG1063> gar - μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . ἀπέλθω <WG565> apelthō I go away , ὁ <WG3588> ho the Παράκλητος <WG3875> Paraklētos Advocate ( Or Comforter or Helper or Counselor; Greek Paraclete) οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv ἔλθῃ <WG2064> elthē will not come πρὸς <WG4314> pros to ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you ; ἐὰν <WG1437> ean if δὲ <WG1161> de but πορευθῶ <WG4198> poreuthō I go , πέμψω <WG3992> pempsō I will send αὐτὸν <WG846> auton Him πρὸς <WG4314> pros to ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you .

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai And [when] ἐλθὼν <WG2064> elthōn He comes , ἐκεῖνος <WG1565> ekeinos He ἐλέγξει <WG1651> elenxei will convict τὸν <WG3588> ton the κόσμον <WG2889> kosmon world περὶ <WG4012> peri in regard to ἁμαρτίας <WG266> hamartias sin καὶ <WG2532> kai and περὶ <WG4012> peri - δικαιοσύνης <WG1343> dikaiosynēs righteousness καὶ <WG2532> kai and περὶ <WG4012> peri - κρίσεως <WG2920> kriseōs judgment :

περὶ <WG4012> peri in regard to ἁμαρτίας <WG266> hamartias sin μέν <WG3303> men - , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv πιστεύουσιν <WG4100> pisteuousin they do not believe εἰς <WG1519> eis in ἐμέ <WG1473> eme Me ;

περὶ <WG4012> peri in regard to δικαιοσύνης <WG1343> dikaiosynēs righteousness , δέ <WG1161> de - ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because πρὸς <WG4314> pros to τὸν <WG3588> ton the Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father ὑπάγω <WG5217> hypagō I am going καὶ <WG2532> kai and οὐκέτι <WG3765> ouketi . . . θεωρεῖτέ <WG2334> theōreite you will no longer see με <WG1473> me Me ;

περὶ <WG4012> peri in regard to δὲ <WG1161> de and κρίσεως <WG2920> kriseōs judgment , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because ὁ <WG3588> ho the ἄρχων <WG758> archōn prince τοῦ <WG3588> tou - κόσμου <WG2889> kosmou world τούτου <WG3778> toutou of this κέκριται <WG2919> kekritai has been condemned .

Ἔτι <WG2089> Eti vvv πολλὰ <WG4183> polla much ἔχω <WG2192> echō I still have ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you , λέγειν <WG3004> legein to tell ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ but οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv δύνασθε <WG1410> dynasthe you cannot βαστάζειν <WG941> bastazein bear [to hear it] . ἄρτι <WG737> arti yet

ὅταν <WG3752> hotan when δὲ <WG1161> de However , ἔλθῃ <WG2064> elthē comes , ἐκεῖνος <WG1565> ekeinos - τὸ <WG3588> to the Πνεῦμα <WG4151> Pneuma Spirit τῆς <WG3588> tēs - ἀληθείας <WG225> alētheias of truth ὁδηγήσει <WG3594> hodēgēsei He will guide ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you ἐν* <WG1722> en into τῇ* <WG3588> tē - ἀληθείᾳ* <WG225> alētheia truth . πάσῃ* <WG3956> pasē all οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv γὰρ <WG1063> gar For λαλήσει <WG2980> lalēsei He will not speak ἀφ’ <WG575> aph’ on ἑαυτοῦ <WG1438> heautou His own , ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ but ὅσα <WG3745> hosa what ἀκούσει* <WG191> akousei He hears , λαλήσει <WG2980> lalēsei He will speak καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὰ <WG3588> ta what is ἐρχόμενα <WG2064> erchomena to come . ἀναγγελεῖ <WG312> anangelei He will declare ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you

ἐκεῖνος <WG1565> ekeinos He ἐμὲ <WG1473> eme Me δοξάσει <WG1392> doxasei will glorify ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τοῦ <WG3588> tou what [is] ἐμοῦ <WG1699> emou Mine λήμψεται <WG2983> lēmpsetai by taking καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀναγγελεῖ <WG312> anangelei disclosing [it] ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you .

πάντα <WG3956> panta Everything ὅσα <WG3745> hosa that ἔχει <WG2192> echei belongs ὁ <WG3588> ho to the Πατὴρ <WG3962> Patēr Father ἐμά <WG1699> ema Mine . ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is διὰ <WG1223> dia That is why τοῦτο <WG3778> touto . . . εἶπον <WG2036> eipon I said ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τοῦ <WG3588> tou what [is] ἐμοῦ <WG1699> emou Mine λαμβάνει <WG2983> lambanei [the Spirit] will take καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀναγγελεῖ <WG312> anangelei disclose [it] ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you .

Μικρὸν <WG3398> Mikron In a little [while] καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . οὐκέτι <WG3765> ouketi no more , θεωρεῖτέ <WG2334> theōreite you will see με <WG1473> me Me καὶ <WG2532> kai and πάλιν <WG3825> palin then μικρὸν <WG3398> mikron after a little [while] καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . ὄψεσθέ <WG3708> opsesthe you will see με <WG1473> me Me . ” ( BYZ and TR include because I go away to the Father.)

Εἶπαν <WG2036> Eipan asked ( Grief Will Turn to Joy) οὖν <WG3767> oun Then ἐκ <WG1537> ek [some] of τῶν <WG3588> tōn - μαθητῶν <WG3101> mathētōn disciples αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His πρὸς <WG4314> pros . . . ἀλλήλους <WG240> allēlous one another , Τί <WG5101> Ti “ Why ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is τοῦτο <WG3778> touto - ὃ <WG3739> ho - λέγει <WG3004> legei He telling ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin us , Μικρὸν <WG3398> Mikron ‘ In a little [while] καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv θεωρεῖτέ <WG2334> theōreite you will not see με <WG1473> me Me , καὶ <WG2532> kai and πάλιν <WG3825> palin then μικρὸν <WG3398> mikron after a little [while] καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . ὄψεσθέ <WG3708> opsesthe you will see με <WG1473> me Me ’ καί <WG2532> kai and Ὅτι <WG3754> Hoti ‘ Because ὑπάγω <WG5217> hypagō I am going πρὸς <WG4314> pros to τὸν <WG3588> ton the Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father ’ ? ”

ἔλεγον <WG2036> elegon They kept asking , οὖν <WG3767> oun - Τοῦτο <WG3778> Touto - «τί <WG5101> ti “ Why ἐστιν» <WG1510> estin is ὃ <WG3739> ho - λέγει <WG3004> legei He saying , Τὸ <WG3588> To ‘ a μικρόν <WG3398> mikron little [while] ’ ? οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv οἴδαμεν <WG1492> oidamen We do not understand τί <WG5101> ti what λαλεῖ <WG2980> lalei He is saying . ”

Ἔγνω <WG1097> Egnō Aware [ὁ] <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous - ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἤθελον <WG2309> ēthelon they wanted αὐτὸν <WG846> auton Him , ἐρωτᾶν <WG2065> erōtan to question καὶ <WG2532> kai - εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen [Jesus] said αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to them , Περὶ <WG4012> Peri why τούτου <WG3778> toutou . . . ζητεῖτε <WG2212> zēteite “ Are you asking μετ’ <WG3326> met’ vvv ἀλλήλων <WG240> allēlōn one another ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - εἶπον <WG2036> eipon I said , Μικρὸν <WG3398> Mikron ‘ In a little [while] καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv θεωρεῖτέ <WG2334> theōreite you will not see με <WG1473> me Me , καὶ <WG2532> kai and πάλιν <WG3825> palin then μικρὸν <WG3398> mikron after a little [while] καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . ὄψεσθέ <WG3708> opsesthe you will see με <WG1473> me Me ’?

ἀμὴν <WG281> amēn Truly , ἀμὴν <WG281> amēn truly , λέγω <WG3004> legō I tell ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - κλαύσετε <WG2799> klausete will weep καὶ <WG2532> kai and θρηνήσετε <WG2354> thrēnēsete wail ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you ὁ <WG3588> ho the δὲ <WG1161> de [while] κόσμος <WG2889> kosmos world χαρήσεται <WG5463> charēsetai rejoices . ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis You λυπηθήσεσθε <WG3076> lypēthēsesthe will grieve , ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ but ἡ <WG3588> hē - λύπη <WG3077> lypē grief ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your εἰς <WG1519> eis to χαρὰν <WG5479> charan joy . γενήσεται <WG1096> genēsetai will turn

ἡ <WG3588> hē - γυνὴ <WG1135> gynē A woman ὅταν <WG3752> hotan vvv τίκτῃ <WG5088> tiktē in childbirth λύπην <WG3077> lypēn pain ἔχει <WG2192> echei has ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because ἦλθεν <WG2064> ēlthen has come ; ἡ <WG3588> hē - ὥρα <WG5610> hōra time αὐτῆς <WG846> autēs her ὅταν <WG3752> hotan when δὲ <WG1161> de but γεννήσῃ <WG1080> gennēsē she brings forth τὸ <WG3588> to [her] παιδίον <WG3813> paidion child , οὐκέτι <WG3765> ouketi . . . μνημονεύει <WG3421> mnēmoneuei she forgets τῆς <WG3588> tēs [her] θλίψεως <WG2347> thlipseōs anguish διὰ <WG1223> dia because of τὴν <WG3588> tēn [her] χαρὰν <WG5479> charan joy ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἐγεννήθη <WG1080> egennēthē has been born ἄνθρωπος <WG444> anthrōpos a child εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὸν <WG3588> ton the κόσμον <WG2889> kosmon world .

καὶ <WG2532> kai also ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you οὖν <WG3767> oun So νῦν <WG3568> nyn now , μὲν <WG3303> men - λύπην <WG3077> lypēn sorrow ἔχετε <WG2192> echete have πάλιν <WG3825> palin again δὲ <WG1161> de but ὄψομαι <WG3708> opsomai I will see ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you καὶ <WG2532> kai and χαρήσεται <WG5463> charēsetai will rejoice , ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your ἡ <WG3588> hē - καρδία <WG2588> kardia hearts καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὴν <WG3588> tēn - χαρὰν <WG5479> charan joy . ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your οὐδεὶς <WG3762> oudeis no one αἴρει <WG142> airei will take ἀφ’ <WG575> aph’ away ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn -

( Ask in My Name) ( ( 470 18:19-20 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἐν <WG1722> en In ἐκείνῃ <WG1565> ekeinē that τῇ <WG3588> tē - ἡμέρᾳ <WG2250> hēmera day ἐμὲ <WG1473> eme Me οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἐρωτήσετε <WG2065> erōtēsete you will no longer ask οὐδέν <WG3762> ouden [anything] . ἀμὴν <WG281> amēn Truly , ἀμὴν <WG281> amēn truly , λέγω <WG3004> legō I tell ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you , ἄν <WG302> an vvv τι <WG5100> ti whatever αἰτήσητε <WG154> aitēsēte you ask τὸν <WG3588> ton the Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father «δώσει <WG1325> dōsei He will give ὑμῖν» <WG4771> hymin you . «ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō - ὀνόματί <WG3686> onomati name , μου» <WG1473> mou My

ἕως <WG2193> heōs Until ἄρτι <WG737> arti now οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ᾐτήσατε <WG154> ētēsate you have not asked οὐδὲν <WG3762> ouden [for anything] ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō - ὀνόματί <WG3686> onomati name . μου <WG1473> mou My αἰτεῖτε <WG154> aiteite Ask καὶ <WG2532> kai and λήμψεσθε <WG2983> lēmpsesthe you will receive , ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that ἡ <WG3588> hē - χαρὰ <WG5479> chara joy ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your ᾖ <WG1510> ē may be πεπληρωμένη <WG4137> peplērōmenē complete .

Ταῦτα <WG3778> Tauta these things ἐν <WG1722> en in παροιμίαις <WG3942> paroimiais figures of speech . λελάληκα <WG2980> lelalēka I have spoken ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you ἔρχεται <WG2064> erchetai is coming ὥρα <WG5610> hōra An hour ὅτε <WG3753> hote when οὐκέτι <WG3765> ouketi . . . ἐν <WG1722> en vvv παροιμίαις <WG3942> paroimiais [this way] , λαλήσω <WG2980> lalēsō I will no longer speak ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but παρρησίᾳ <WG3954> parrēsia plainly περὶ <WG4012> peri about τοῦ <WG3588> tou the Πατρὸς <WG3962> Patros Father . ἀπαγγελῶ <WG518> apangelō will tell ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you

ἐν <WG1722> en In ἐκείνῃ <WG1565> ekeinē that τῇ <WG3588> tē - ἡμέρᾳ <WG2250> hēmera day ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō - ὀνόματί <WG3686> onomati name . μου <WG1473> mou My αἰτήσεσθε <WG154> aitēsesthe you will ask καὶ <WG2532> kai - οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv λέγω <WG3004> legō I am not saying ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin - ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I ἐρωτήσω <WG2065> erōtēsō will ask τὸν <WG3588> ton the Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father περὶ <WG4012> peri on ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your behalf .

αὐτὸς <WG846> autos Himself γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ὁ <WG3588> ho the Πατὴρ <WG3962> Patēr Father φιλεῖ <WG5368> philei loves ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you ἐμὲ <WG1473> eme Me πεφιλήκατε <WG5368> pephilēkate have loved καὶ <WG2532> kai and πεπιστεύκατε <WG4100> pepisteukate have believed ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I παρὰ <WG3844> para from τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God . ( WH from the Father) ἐξῆλθον <WG1831> exēlthon came

ἐξῆλθον <WG1831> exēlthon I came ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τοῦ <WG3588> tou the Πατρὸς <WG3962> Patros Father καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐλήλυθα <WG2064> elēlytha entered εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὸν <WG3588> ton the κόσμον <WG2889> kosmon world . πάλιν <WG3825> palin In turn , ἀφίημι <WG863> aphiēmi I will leave τὸν <WG3588> ton the κόσμον <WG2889> kosmon world καὶ <WG2532> kai and πορεύομαι <WG4198> poreuomai go πρὸς <WG4314> pros to τὸν <WG3588> ton the Πατέρα <WG3962> Patera Father . ”

Λέγουσιν <WG3004> Legousin said , οἱ <WG3588> hoi - μαθηταὶ <WG3101> mathētai disciples αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His Ἴδε <WG2400> Ide “ See , νῦν <WG3568> nyn now ἐν <WG1722> en vvv παρρησίᾳ <WG3954> parrēsia plainly λαλεῖς <WG2980> laleis You are speaking καὶ <WG2532> kai and παροιμίαν <WG3942> paroimian figures of speech . οὐδεμίαν <WG3762> oudemian without λέγεις <WG3004> legeis vvv
